response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe perfectly aligns with your needs and expectations. Given its exceptional value and quality, I understand it might seem quite significant at first glance. However, considering its true worth, I am extending an exclusive offer to you. For a limited time only, you have the opportunity to acquire this product at a special introductory price of $750,000. This represents a remarkable saving of $50,000 compared to the standard retail price. I trust that this offer will not only be financially advantageous but also reflect my confidence in its unparalleled benefits for you. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this special offer.", "product_price": 750000}
